snippet: The Dolphins' Taylor, who is retiring, said: "I don't deserve it. You know Don Shula deserves to be carried off this field, Dan Marino does, Zach Thomas deserved to be carried off this field."
abstract: The Dolphins' Taylor, who is retiring, said: "I don't deserve it. You know Don Shula deserves to be carried off this field, Dan Marino does, Zach Thomas deserved to be carried off this field."

headline.main: Jason Taylor on Being Carried Off the Field
